content: a simple but with bold results top down sweater design features a circular yoke with a drop stitch design and single row striping matching striping for sleeve cuffs and bottom hem creates additional visual effect this is the first version please let me know of any errors 9/15 - two revisions in one day 1 incorrect marker setup there should be 8 slices of equal stitch counts 2 rewrote the diving for sleeves section to make it a little clearer
